journal-title-group.journal-title: The Journal of Aesthetics and Art Criticism

title-group.article-title: "Tempus Fugit": Voice, Intentionality, and Formal Invention in Augustine and Monteverdi

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2008 The American Society for Aesthetics
